02/04
-
Weslaco City Commission Workshop/ Weslaco City Commission Meeting

02/04
-
Planning and Zoning Monthly Meeting

[go to calendar](https://www.weslacotx.gov/calendar.php)

* City Commission

The Commission is comprised of two Commissioners At-Large and four single-member districts in Weslaco.
Each
**Commissioner is elected to a four year term.
The City Commission appoints the Mayor Pro-Tem who serves in the absence of the Mayor.**

| **Additional Information**Special meetings or workshops may be   called by the City Commission   as needed.   For further information   contact us at 956-968-3181.  **Regular Meetings**5:30 p.m.   1st and 3rd Tuesday of each month   Weslaco City Hall   255 S. Kansas Ave.   Commission Legislative Chambers   Weslaco, TX 78596 |  | **City Secretary** [View Agendas & Minutes](https://www.weslacotx.gov/government/open_government/open_meetings/index.php) |
